caller_intent: Betty Udd wants to address a discrepancy between her North Carolina policy's approved rate and the amount charged, seeking a premium reduction.
resolution_steps: Holly retrieves Betty's policy renewal details, noting the current premium and coverage amounts.
Holly explains the premium is based on replacement cost and deductible, suggesting increasing the deductible to $2,500 to lower the premium.
Calculates the new premium ($1,600 annually) after adjusting the deductible and explains potential savings over time.
Confirms Betty's agreement to the deductible change and schedules processing of the update.
Addresses Betty's follow-up question about adding a Florida car to the policy, explaining title requirements for North Carolina registration.
knowledge_required: Deductible adjustments and their impact on premiums
systems_referenced: Policy renewal system (for retrieving coverage details)
summary: Betty Udd contacted Alliance Insurance to address a premium discrepancy on her North Carolina policy. The agent, Holly, explained the premium calculation based on replacement cost and deductible, proposed increasing the deductible to $2,500 to reduce the annual premium from $1,894 to $1,600, and processed the change. Betty also inquired about adding her Florida car to the policy, and Holly explained the need for a North Carolina-registered title. The call concluded with Betty agreeing to the deductible adjustment and awaiting updated documents.
